document.full_text: australia hopes to lure michael phelps for a head-to-head clash with comeback kid ian thorpe to spice up an elite local swim meeting, local media reported sunday.
document.title: australia hope to lure phelps for thorpe showdown
lines_and_colors: australia hopes to lure michael phelps for a head-to-head clash with comeback kid ian thorpe to spice up an elite local swim meeting, local media reported sunday.
